body_html:
Last commit 418d74f adds separate test with Numpy check.

@cpuhrsch Performance for doubles improves slightly with this change.

On master

['tanh']
tanh:           size: 10^2      count: 10000    elapsed: 35.51650547981262      type: torch.DoubleTensor
tanh:           size: 10^3      count: 1000     elapsed: 10.246849060058594     type: torch.DoubleTensor
tanh:           size: 10^4      count: 100      elapsed: 5.211124897003174      type: torch.DoubleTensor
tanh:           size: 10^5      count: 10       elapsed: 7.016204595565796      type: torch.DoubleTensor

After 418d74f :

['tanh']
tanh:           size: 10^2      count: 10000    elapsed: 25.467238664627075     type: torch.DoubleTensor
tanh:           size: 10^3      count: 1000     elapsed: 8.186361312866211      type: torch.DoubleTensor
tanh:           size: 10^4      count: 100      elapsed: 4.314857721328735      type: torch.DoubleTensor
tanh:           size: 10^5      count: 10       elapsed: 2.8747189044952393     type: torch.DoubleTensor

body:
Last commit 418d74f adds separate test with Numpy check. 

@cpuhrsch Performance for doubles improves slightly with this change. 

On master
```
['tanh']
tanh:           size: 10^2      count: 10000    elapsed: 35.51650547981262      type: torch.DoubleTensor
tanh:           size: 10^3      count: 1000     elapsed: 10.246849060058594     type: torch.DoubleTensor
tanh:           size: 10^4      count: 100      elapsed: 5.211124897003174      type: torch.DoubleTensor
tanh:           size: 10^5      count: 10       elapsed: 7.016204595565796      type: torch.DoubleTensor
```

After 418d74f :
```
['tanh']
tanh:           size: 10^2      count: 10000    elapsed: 25.467238664627075     type: torch.DoubleTensor
tanh:           size: 10^3      count: 1000     elapsed: 8.186361312866211      type: torch.DoubleTensor
tanh:           size: 10^4      count: 100      elapsed: 4.314857721328735      type: torch.DoubleTensor
tanh:           size: 10^5      count: 10       elapsed: 2.8747189044952393     type: torch.DoubleTensor
```
